text: is it possible to skip all rows below `comment='#'` while reading in a csv `CSV.read(file; comment="#")`  ? i see the comment only skips the given row.

elements.text: is it possible to skip all rows below
? i see the comment only skips the given row.

text: Your understanding is correct. The only ways to limit parsing are the skipfooter and limit keyword arguments currently
